procedures security policies configuration changes migration procedures for maintaining the database for future reference and disaster recovery Database Administrator SQL Commercial Bank of Ethiopia January 2012 to May 2013 Responsibilities Optimized SQL queries to improve performance and availability Monitored server activity error logs and growth of database objects for capacity planning Worked with the development team on design and creation of database instance tables user defined data types function stored procedures triggers constraints and indexes as well as tuning existing SQL scripts Set up user accounts for specified users and user access levels for database and managed security tasks like granting and revoking permission Designed and implemented Database Backup maintenance plan and Recovery strategy with HA and DR Checked the database consistency using DBCC commands and resolved various performance issues using SQL tools like SQL Tracer using SQL Profiler Designed and put in place standard documentation to major changes to the SQL Server Education BSC in Computer Science in Computer Science Hawassa University Skills Access 2003 Less than 1 year database 4 years MS SQL
